replies.msg: Nok 十年如一日都係4-6呢個位

轉貼


Honestly, some of you don’t understand how this works.

It’s simple, people have short positions on a stock. In order to squeeze them to cover we need to raise the share price.

The only way to do this is by being united and going after one or possibly two stocks. By everyone investing into the selected stocks we raise the price and the shorts are forced to buy their shares (aka cover). This cover raises the share price even more.

If we are sporadic and spread out then we don’t force them to cover.

So by everyone posting different stocks we have little effect.

So unless your posting something about NOK or AMC... shhhhh!

Those are the targets of the majority. If your not willing to get in on those then stop wasting your time on here and f***ing it up for everyone else.

NOK AND AMC... those are the two as they both have a large portion of options expiring Friday.
